transportAdvice: Kuala Lumpur has an extensive metro and light rail network that connects most major tourist areas, shopping districts, and the city centre, making it a practical and affordable way to get around. Taxis and ride-hailing cars are widely available, though walking between attractions can be challenging due to heat, humidity, and inconsistent pedestrian infrastructure.

weather.description: Warm and humid with occasional afternoon showers, generally manageable for sightseeing.
